name: Reality Street - North Side
description: Reality Street continues its journey along the northern perimeter here, the cracked sidewalk bordered by buildings that have seen better decades. To the north, a police precinct station looms with the kind of architectural authority that suggests someone once cared about law and order - the bars on the windows suggest they still do, just differently now. The building's facade bears the stains of time and perhaps a few things that don't bear thinking about. To the south, a chain-link fence separates you from Highland Park, where nature and neglect have reached an uneasy d√©tente. The street continues east and west, its surface decorated with the abstract art of oil stains and discarded hopes.
